::Zardus/DeathStorm::

In the alliance base, the comp beeps as it detects a new stasis pod. Zardus 
looks at the screen.

"Proquest," He says into his comm-link, "Can you check out the new pod."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Somewhere in the ship DeathStorm nods.

"On my way." He replies to Zardus and flies out of the base, heading for 
Grimlock's position.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Back on the bridge, Zardus recieves Icedeamon's distress call. "Retreat back 
to base, Icedeamon."
